General.Name: Solid Power Inc
General.Description: Solid Power, Inc. develops solid-state battery technologies for the electric vehicles (EV) and other markets in the United States. The company sells its sulfide-based solid electrolyte; and licenses its solid-state cell designs and manufacturing processes. Solid Power, Inc. was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Louisville, Colorado.
General.Address: 486 South Pierce Avenue, Louisville, CO, United States, 80027
